name: Epic Shellbeat
description: Creatures from the deep are oft met by seafaring Monsters with apprehension, but the Epic Shellbeat swims against the current. This beat-keeping Epic is the sonic equivalent of a lighthouse in the dark, playing a reliable rhythm that guides disoriented vessels to the safety of the shore. When the living ocean beckons for a lifeguard, Epic Shellbeat is there!
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 1 day 19 hr, Enhanced Time: 1 day 8 hr 15 min
